website_summaries.verdict: Whether your child has several Fingerlings or you are looking for a cute, interactive toy, this adorable unicorn makes a perfect gift.
pros: Young fans will be eager to get this interactive unicorn
Choice of characters and colors, including Jojo and MacKenzie
cons: At least one parent reported a unicorn with a light that wouldn't power off, resulting in dead batteries
Otherwise, kids are very enthused about these unicorns

customer_reviews.title: Eats batteries
customer_reviews.text: This particular fingerling makes particularly annoying sounds that are all very similar. My other daughters fingerling has more varied sounds. This one also burns through batteries rather quickly. Regardless of whether they are being used, they kill batteries in about 1 day if the switch is left in the on postion.....even in standby. Maybe the fact that the unicorn horn lights up impacts battery life as well. My daughter is 4, and she really likes this silly thing. However, there is only so much she can do with it, so she will probably lose interest soon.
customer_reviews.author: Whimsical

customer_reviews.title: Need help from seller please**Handled**
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Jojo light up one and I didn’t get the color/unicorn one/Jojo that I wanted. My little girl isn’t getting much for holidays as a single mom I just can’t but she REALLY wanted this specific one. I don’t know how to reach anyone to try to get the right one that I actually ordered to me. Please reach out to me seller. Thank you. Once this is handled I’ll update review also. EDITED TO ADD- item was reahipped no additional charge and was extremely pleased with the outcome and the friendly fast nature of the seller. Will shop again!
customer_reviews.author: Angie I will give positive ⭐️

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old daughter last Christmas. She loves it. Seems pretty durable as she is pretty hard on toys and it is still kicking. Very cute, might be slightly annoying for parents with the noises that it makes but not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I Don't Get it, but Kids Like Them
customer_reviews.text: Yeah I'm not sure what the attraction to this toy is, but all I can say is the kids really have fun with these and run around with them on their fingers/hands playing together. So isn't that all we want? Kids to have fun and run around in groups to play? For me, that is what I wanted! This was a donation to a foster home and it was a hit. SO even though I don't "get" this toy, even if you don't "get it" either, just buy it! It's fun for the right age group, just comply with the guidelines and watch the kids have fun :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas B.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Made a 4-year-olds Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go with this fingerling as my daughter is obsessed with unicorns and wanted one with the light-up horn. At all of our local stores, the price was significantly more. For the price, it’s totally worth it! My daughters little face just lit up when she saw her Unicorn fingerling on Christmas! Now, almost a week later it’s working just as good as it did straight out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old LOVES this little unicorn. It was by far her favorite C-mas present. It's really cute. It lights up, changes color, makes happy little noises. I will definitely be buying her more of these!
customer_reviews.author: My Redeemer Lives

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but easily broken
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a Christmas gift for my daughter (she is 3). She LOVED it! The light up horn and little noises are so cute! But in less than 2 months, it stopped working. We thought it was the batteries, so we replaced them, but it just kept making the same broken sound over and over. I sent it back for a refund. Other than that, it was cute!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Black

customer_reviews.title: They rock buy one for your kid!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this lil unicorn jo jo !!! I got her for my niece and she was ecstatic about her ! She was all smiles after she opened that gift and she was sick with a cold and still happy as pie! I recommend this lil Jojo unicorn 🦄! I am actually buying another for myself to play with my niece! They are fun and make us laugh!LOVE❤️🌈🦄
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved these, but are very annoying
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved these even though I find them a bit annoying. They make a lot of noise even when a kid is not playing with it, Im searching for them and shutting them off a lot. One already wore down its batteries after 2 weeks. I probably wont be getting anymore of these things.
customer_reviews.author: MoparOrNoCar

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Fun
customer_reviews.text: There was so much Fingerling buzz that I gave in and got my 4-year-old one. In less than five minutes she lost interest and hasn't picked it up again.. There is very little function and actions and just doesn't seem worth all of the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Can't really recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my niece who loves pink and glitter and unicorns. It makes incredibly creepy noises and continues to do so until manually turned off, which this age group frequently neglects to do. It blinks, turns its head and lights up.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: Fingerlings
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for my great g-daughter; I didn't realize how large it is. My granddaughter is only two. So it's too big for her finger. Still a cute toy. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Color is off
customer_reviews.text: The colors are off. The hair is a light pink, I ordered with the hope of getting the strawberry colored hair for the strawberry colored hair little girl I bought it for. So a little disappointed on that. But the product itself is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these which work quite well when two children want to communicate to each other. Would work well also if a parent needs to talk to their child (use as a communication breaker would also work).
customer_reviews.author: Louise Couture

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was an "it" toy around here, and the price was right. My kids like their interactive quality, I like the off switch.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Z

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for our six-year-old granddaughter. She had a blast with them!
customer_reviews.author: Fran Duerksen

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kids!
customer_reviews.text: The girls loved them! They love unicorns and squealed with delight upon opening these!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Neat little toy for the unicorn lover
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool little toy that was larger than I expected with really bright colors and good detail, which I didn't really expect. Overall pleased with this little stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loves
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter loves her Jojo Fingerling! This made her 8th Birthday a success. She has ADHD, and this little pal comes highly recommended for her condition. This is her second one, and she loves them both. They are so cute! I want one!😉
customer_reviews.author: Raven.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great gift! Definitely was a top toy being a fingerling & a unicorn!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn’t do much.
customer_reviews.text: Bored 3 year old. I didn’t know what exactly this was but it was cute. Thought it would do more I guess and was disappointed in it as much as toddler was.
customer_reviews.author: Michele P

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money my daughter used it once or twice and it already making weird sounds and she is not able to play with it any more because it’s annoying
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: We got a dud!
customer_reviews.text: We opened up the package and our first impression was not good. It looked used. There were scuff marks and the color was chipping off the hands and feet. We proceeded to turn it on and nothing. There was no sound or movement. I checked batteries and turned on again and there was some noise but not working like it should. This was either damaged before or in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Labyed

customer_reviews.title: You will not be dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. My niece wanted this very bad for Christmas, and I’m glad you had it. Quick shipping and excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Received broken
customer_reviews.text: Received this broken. Unicorn didn't light up or make noise. Bought new batteries thinking they sent me the toy with old batteries. The unicorn STILL didn't work. Returned it and bought somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMomTo4

customer_reviews.title: She loves them
customer_reviews.text: My little angel love these things get the panda if available but this is cool also

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: As expected. My kids love these so we bought them for their cousins as well. My daughters are 5 & 6 years old and our niece is 3 years old. All of them really love these.

customer_reviews.title: Cute.

customer_reviews.title: They are really enjoyable

customer_reviews.text: We got exactly what we were expecting. These toys are difficult to work though!

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find this wonderful toy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these toys. She can’t get enough of them. I do like them as well

customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter is going to love this. Although she is younger than recommended and won’t be able to use all of its features right away, I know she will adore it anyway.

product_meta.title: WowWee Fingerlings Light Up Glitter Unicorn, Jojo Interactive Collectible Baby Pet, Glitter pink 3848
product_meta.description: Jojo the fingerlings light up unicorn loves to grab onto things… especially your fingers! this unique little pet has a special unicorn horn that lights up and cycles through a variety of colors! with iridescent sparkles on her arms and legs, Jojo loves to shimmer and shine! she also responds to you with special unicorn sounds in response to noise, motion & touch, and will let you know how she feels with her adorable, blinking eyes and head turns. You’ll get different reactions if you pet her, rock her to sleep, or hold her upside down. If you blow your unicorn a kiss, she will kiss you right back! you can also brush her soft mane and tail. A magical friendship at your fingertips!
feature_bullets: My name is jojo and I'm here to brighten your day!
Magical pet unicorn with a light up horn that cycles through a variety of colors!
Jojo is a pink sparkly unicorn with iridescent sparkles on her arms and legs!
Responds to noise, motion, and touch with blinking eyes, head turns, and a variety of cute noises.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars579 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
